metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez Seoane, Elena M
metadata.dc:description: The increase in illnesses and behavior disorders which medical personnel have observed among contemporary women during clinical practice in the outpatient services for Primary Health and Mental Health Care, basically anxiety and depression related disorders, is the reason why the author has written this article. This fact leads us to reflect on what is occurring.
metadata.dc:title: Salud mental en la mujer contemporánea.
[Mental health in contemporary women].
